title: My Client (Legacy & Alpha) are to slow.

replies.body: Is this happening specifically when trying to authenticate?  Your connection could be having a problem reaching the server, so it could take a while or time out.  If that's the case then you'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network.  Hope this helps!
